author: Steff Thomas
title: As USNS Comfort departs for NY, Trump calls it a 'message of hope and solidarity'
description: President Donald Trump on Saturday gave remarks as the USNS Comfort, loaned to the novel coronavirus cause by the U.S. Navy, departed for New York.
content:
President Donald Trump on Saturday gave remarks as the USNS Comfort, a ship loaned to the novel coronavirus cause by the U.S. Navy, was set to depart for New York, saying the government is working to "vanquish the virus."
"As we gather today, our country is … [+3099 chars]
